page.title: 06FURNISHING & DECORATION:Cont
page.content: Easy chairs,settees or sofas with easy to clean covers or more permanent material,bookcases, side boards or similar fitments are the furnishings in the living-room(lounge).Polished wooden tables and upright chairs are in the dining area, or a seperate dining-room. There are curtains;sometimes net,but usually of patterned material, at most of the windows, and blinds for bathroom and kitchen. Mostly, curtains are 'lined' (double thickness), to keep out the East wind. Walls and ceilings are usually covered with Emulsion or wallpaper,with ceramic tiling in some bathrooms and kitchens. The bedrooms have considerable cupboard space; twin or double beds with soft pillows and Duvets.
